Imports

basic, types

Types

VipsKernel = enum
  VIPS_KERNEL_NEAREST, VIPS_KERNEL_LINEAR, VIPS_KERNEL_CUBIC,
  VIPS_KERNEL_MITCHELL, VIPS_KERNEL_LANCZOS2, VIPS_KERNEL_LANCZOS3,
  VIPS_KERNEL_LAST
VipsSize = enum
  VIPS_SIZE_BOTH, VIPS_SIZE_UP, VIPS_SIZE_DOWN, VIPS_SIZE_FORCE, VIPS_SIZE_LAST
